definition[0]: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which
example[0]: You can buy anything you want.
example[1]: He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
example[2]: Anything would be better than staying at home!
example[3]: You can write about swimming, skiing, or anything else you enjoy doing.
example[4]: Is there anything I can do to help?
example[5]: Do you want anything from the shops?
example[6]: Would you like anything else to eat?
definition[2]: used in negative sentences to mean no thing, event etc
example[7]: We didn’t have anything to eat for three days.
example[8]: Don’t do anything until we get there.
